summary: God Bless Bitcoin Documentary - The documentary delves into the historical ​context and evolution of money, highlighting the systemic issues that have ​plagued traditional currencies. By ​showcasing the voices of those who have ​been marginalized and oppressed by the ​existing financial system, God Bless Bitcoin ​makes a powerful case for the necessity ​of a decentralized, transparent, and ​incorruptible monetary alternative. The film ​not only educates but also inspires, urging ​viewers to question the ethics of our ​current financial practices and to consider ​the transformative potential of Bitcoin.
